A Cloud and Docker Blog Site

The Cloud is pervasive .. although we do not realize it.

A Blog Site to Explain to myself Cloud Concepts . Cloud is a computing abstraction to accomplish new processes and analisys on a huge amount of data, often generated by the Cloud itself, but it is also a set of tools can be used to improve the Cloud's behaviour itself. So i'd like to understand in deep how these tools operate and then back to understand how they can be used to modify the current life's processes.
